div.head: 目為物傷
div.div: , the eye is injured by a [foreign] object

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: , the eye is injured by a [foreign] object

sense.def: Pathological Condition brought forth by injury caused to the eye from outside by a foreign object. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yang 羊 quoting Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 33: 眼為他物所傷 ”The eye is injured by a foreign object”, writes: 目為物傷 , “ The eye is injured by a [foreign] object ”,
